summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of POS integrated numpad functionality. All 16 features tested and working correctly. The numpad is properly integrated into the right column (NOT a popup) as requested by the user.

features_tested.feature: POS page loads correctly and shows products
features_tested.notes: 4 products displayed: Chips Naturel ($6.00), Cola 330ml ($5.00), Fanta 330ml ($5.00), Water 500ml ($3.00)

features_tested.feature: Adding products to cart updates the cart display and totals
features_tested.notes: Cart shows items, quantities, subtotal, BTW (10%), and total correctly

features_tested.feature: Integrated payment method selection visible in right column
features_tested.notes: Contant/Pin buttons visible in right column when cart has items, disabled when empty

features_tested.feature: Clicking Contant shows integrated numpad (not popup)
features_tested.notes: Numpad appears directly in right column, NOT as a dialog/popup

features_tested.feature: Quick amount buttons (10, 20, 50, 100, 200) set received amount
features_tested.notes: Quick buttons correctly set the received amount

features_tested.feature: Confirm button disabled when received < total
features_tested.notes: Button shows 'Nog $X.XX' in gray when insufficient

features_tested.feature: Confirm button enabled and green when received >= total
features_tested.notes: Button shows 'Betaling Bevestigen' in green when sufficient

features_tested.feature: Exact button sets received to ceil(total)
Terug (back) button returns to payment method selection
Completing payment shows success screen with wisselgeld
features_tested.notes: Shows receipt number, method, total, received, wisselgeld

features_tested.feature: Volgende button resets for next customer
features_tested.notes: Clears cart and returns to initial state

features_tested.feature: Pin payment processes directly without numpad
features_tested.notes: Pin payment goes directly to processing, no numpad shown

additional_tests.notes: Second dot is ignored, preventing invalid decimals

critical_code_review_comments: POS numpad is correctly integrated into the right column layout as requested
All data-testid attributes are properly implemented for testing
Payment flow is smooth: method selection -> numpad (for cash) -> processing -> success -> reset
Change calculation and button state management work correctly
context_for_next_testing_agent: POS integrated numpad functionality fully tested and working. The numpad is integrated directly into the right column of the POS page (not a popup). All numpad buttons, quick amounts, action buttons (Exact, Wis, Reset), and payment flow work correctly. Products available: Chips Naturel ($6.00), Cola 330ml ($5.00), Fanta 330ml ($5.00), Water 500ml ($3.00). BTW is 10%.
